content: //youtu be/pji5yo656u4 create a circle of french knots that measures approximately 1 25 in diameter create petals radiating from the edge of the french knot center using the lazy daisy stitch link to the lazy daisy stitch tutorial can be found here https //youtu be/sm5gpowy0yo stitch 5 rosettes of slightly varying size around the bottom of the daisy as pictured link to embroidered rosette tutorial https //youtu be/e8reefh3hsg add leaves using the lazy daisy stitch if the yarn starts to break while embroidering use shorter lengths to reduce the number of times it is pulled through the work to minimize thinning weave in ends handles place handles approximately 2 5 inches from each side at the top of the bag checking twice to make sure they re evenly spaced on both sides cocoknits handles are easily adjustable so if your handles need a little tweaking don t fret about it
